text:
- [Narrator] Tens of
thousands of customers
already rely on Amazon Redshift
to analyze exabytes of data
and run complex analytical queries,
making it the most widely used and trusted
data warehouse in the cloud.
Now, Amazon Redshift Serverless

enables extra fast query results
on all your data across AWS

in familiar SQL, without
having to think about
data warehouse infrastructure.

Data scientists, developers,
and data analysts
can access meaningful insights
and build data driven applications
with this simple zero maintenance feature.

Amazon Redshift Serverless
automatically provisions

the right capacity for
your unpredictable needs.
Simply load your data and start querying.
You can keep using your favorite BI tools,
build machine learning models in SQL,

or combine your data with a
third party's for new insights

because Redshift Serverless
seamlessly integrates
with your data ecosystem.

It lets you pay as you
go on a per second basis,

which means if your
data warehouse is idle,
you don't have to pay for anything.

On top of that, you can
set your spend limit amount
so you never go over your budget.
Go from data to insights in seconds

and get started with Amazon
Redshift Serverless today.
(gentle music)
